creator: Tripledot Studios Limited
descriptionHtml:
Triple Tile - Match 3D tiles puzzle game 🧩 is an engaging matching game.

Relax and exercise your mind by matching tiles in 3s til you clear the board. Clearing a board completes the level, unlocks the next level and progress you through the beautiful maps. This puzzle game features 100s of levels featuring varying backgrounds as you traverse on your journey through the map. Levels come in a range of difficulty. Test your mind and clear the levels, improving your skills along the way.

Learn more about Triple Tile 🀄️

- Place objects into the hand. Take your time with no time limits. Three of the same tile will be eliminated! Train your brain by progressing through the many levels in this enjoyable matching puzzle game 🧠

- Traverse the world by completing the many levels and chapters , discovering beautiful landscapes on your journey 🌎

Game features🌟

□ 30+ vibrant 3D tiles to see across hundreds of unique levels

□ Endless backgrounds and environments to explore 🗺: Forests 🏕, Castles 🏰, Oceans 🏖 ... all unlocked by completing chapters!

□ 1000s of layouts, all featuring powerful boosts to help along the way: The magic match, undo and shuffle ✊

□ Take on challenging levels, collect stars ⭐️, trek through the world map 🗺 and feed your brain! Start your Tile Journey with Triple Tile!

Play Now:

□ Available to play on mobile and tablet devices!📱

□ Relaxing gameplay for the mind 😌

□ Connect all the tiles and clear the board! 😁

□ From easy levels to mind-bending challenges, there's a test for everyone 😎

□ Explore through 100s of levels, beautiful maps and backgrounds
descriptionShort: Match 3D Tiles Puzzle Game

title: Triple Tile

creator: Tripledot Studios Limited
descriptionHtml:
Start playing Triple Tile today – tap, match and relax with modern mobile mahjong.
Solve 3D tile puzzles. Clear the board by matching 3 tiles. Unlock beautiful chapters with the help of boosters. Visit scenic landscapes and reach the top of the saga map.
Start your relaxing journey today - take a scenic walk and escape from reality with Triple Tile.

TRIPLE TILE features:
* FIND YOUR ZEN: Tap, match and repeat. Unique 3D game with beautiful tiles.
* TRAIN YOUR BRAIN: Each level is a complex 3D puzzle, ready for you to unwind and solve.
* TRAVEL THE WORLD: Track your progress and reach new locations as you play - from Greek seasides to amazonian forests
* HUNDREDS OF PUZZLES: Play through 12 exciting chapters at launch, with more chapters added monthly
descriptionShort: Match 3D Tiles Puzzle Game
